author: Francisco-Gamino
body:
This is a work item. 

Currently, the Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility component, has two map.json files which should be consolidated into one. Here are their locations:

1) PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility\map.json
2) PowerShell\src\Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility\commands\utility\WebCmdlet\map.json

comments.author: vors
vors
comments.body: @Francisco-Gamino I'm working on #1555 and as part of it, I need map.json files. I will take care about this issue.

title: Need to consolidate map.json files for Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility component
